messages.message: That's helpful to better understand. Thank you @Kerry. Do we currently benchmark or measure the accuracy of this, to determine how well we are getting the correct chunks?

we don't specifically benchmark chunk selection accuracy but we benchmark the final result regularly. here's the results in March with different models that we tested. you can imagine the chunk selection accuracy can only be greater than the accuracy numbers here, as if we select the wrong chunk the answer will definitely be wrong; even if we select the right chunk, there's a chance that model is not able to generate the correct answer from the chunk text given
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1iNQWZ9754Ip2dCOJQ8xFvIWtyCPy-Xgr8obSqqls9v8/edit#heading=h.lcxut5yw1zw

i'll also add a note that our benchmarking dataset also skews more towards extraction type of questions (find X and return as is). definitely let us know if you start asking more reasoning type of questions -- and multi-step is designed for that (default and advanced model pipeline are both optimized for extraction)
